articles.title: NOVEMBER, 1970
articles.summary: This document from November 1970 lists the key officers of an organization for that month. It identifies Dave Erickson as President, Thomas Halliday as Vice-President, David Ambrose as Secretary, and J. Emmet Murphy as Treasurer.

articles.title: NOVEMBER MEETING--EQUIPMENT NIGHT
articles.summary: The November meeting of the SJAA is an 'Equipment Night' on November 6th at Community Bank, where members are encouraged to bring and discuss their astronomical gear, and items for sale or swap. The bulletin also includes updates on a successful October workparty, the relocation of a loaner telescope, an upcoming starparty, and plans for a December Morrison Lecturer who will require member assistance for publicity.

articles.title: CALENDAR OF FALL EVENTS
articles.summary: This document presents a calendar of fall events, outlining a series of activities from late October to mid-December. Key events include star parties at Lora-Cothran Site and New Moon, regular club meetings (featuring an 'Equipment Night' and a potential Morrison lecturer), and board meetings. The schedule also highlights the Leonid meteor shower, providing dates and some logistical details.

articles.title: SECTION A-STAR ATLASES
articles.summary: This document presents a price list for various star atlases, detailing their retail prices, specific discount structures for bulk purchases or fixed percentage discounts, and corresponding agent prices. It functions as a sales catalog for astronomical publications.

articles.title: THE MACMILLAN SKY AND TELESCOPE LIBRARY
articles.summary: This document outlines 'THE MACMILLAN SKY AND TELESCOPE LIBRARY,' an eight-volume book series covering various astronomy topics from the solar system to galaxies. Each volume is listed with its original price, a 33 1/3% discount, and the resulting reduced price of $5.30.

articles.title: A.L.P.O. BOOKS ON ASTRONOMY (1)
articles.summary: This document, titled "A.L.P.O. BOOKS ON ASTRONOMY (1)", presents a list of astronomy books available for purchase, including classic titles by renowned astronomers such as Bok, Menzel, Shapley, and Whipple. Each book is offered with a 25% discount through A.L.P.O., listing both retail and discounted 'agent' prices.

articles.title: SECTION M- MAPS OF THE MOON AND SKY
articles.summary: This document, titled "SECTION M- MAPS OF THE MOON AND SKY," outlines a pricing structure for various astronomical maps. It details bulk pricing for general lunar maps, along with individual costs and potential discounts for color charts of the Moon, a color map of the Southern Sky, and lunar quadrant maps.

articles.title: SECTION O-OBSERVING AIDS AND CATALOGUES
articles.summary: This document, titled "SECTION O-OBSERVING AIDS AND CATALOGUES," lists various astronomical observing aids and catalogues available, along with associated numerical values that appear to represent prices and discounts. It covers resources like Naked-Eye Stars, the Arizona-Tonantzintla Catalogue, Visual Observing of Double Stars, Atlas of the Heavens-II Catalogue, Finest Deep-Sky Objects, and The Messier Catalogue.

articles.title: SECTION S-SETS OF ASTRONOMICAL PHOTOGRAPHS
articles.summary: This document section details various 'sets of astronomical photographs,' including 'SKY SETS' and 'JUMBO SETS.' It functions as a price list or catalog, showing original prices, a 30% discount, and the resulting discounted prices for each set of photographs.

articles.title: SECTION T-TELESCOPES AND CAMERAS
articles.summary: This document outlines a price list for various publications or guides under the 'T-Telescopes and Cameras' section. It details retail prices, discounts, and agent pricing for items such as skygazing telescopes, binoculars, outer space photography guides, and instructions for building different types of telescopes.

articles.title: SECTION Z-MISCELLANEOUS PUBLICATIONS
articles.summary: This document, titled 'SECTION Z-MISCELLANEOUS PUBLICATIONS,' presents a catalog of astronomy-related publications available for purchase. Each entry includes the publication title, original price, discount percentage, and final discounted price, covering topics from becoming an astronomer to a dictionary of terms and astronomical implications of relativity.

articles.title: SPECIAL COMBINATION ITEMS
articles.summary: The document presents a list of "SPECIAL COMBINATION ITEMS," which are discounted bundles of astronomy-related books and atlases. Each combination includes its original price, a percentage discount, and the final reduced price, with a note that postage is additional to the listed rates.

articles.title: PHOTOGRAPHIC STAR ATLASES
articles.summary: This document lists various photographic star atlases available for purchase, detailing retail prices, a 15% discount, and the final agent price. It includes atlases for both the Northern and Southern skies, specialized deep-sky atlases, and Milky Way mosaics, often with different editions or parts.
